jd:
Role: Sr .Net Developer
Client: Deloitte
Rate: $55/hr on C2C
Location: Remote (Travel once in a month if client req)

Full-Stack Developer with expertise in Kafka, React.js, .NET, and microservices architecture. This role involves designing and building end-to-end software solutions. You will work with cross-functional teams to deliver seamless, integrated solutions that align with business requirements.

Responsibilities include:
- Design, develop, and maintain scalable microservices using .NET and other related technologies.
- Build engaging and dynamic front-end interfaces using React.js, ensuring high-quality user experiences.
- Develop and integrate real-time data pipelines using Kafka for streaming and messaging services.
- Write and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code, following best practices in software design, security, and testing.
- Participate in code reviews, troubleshooting, and debugging to optimize application performance.
- Deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms (Azure) and contribute to CI/CD pipelines.
